name: catholicSaved
leagueRules: Can Declare Religious War. Catholic League only. If Join, -1 DI from each Protestant Prince. Religious Victory after Round 4 Religious War if Emperor, 7 Electors, and > 1/2 map Catholic.
savedBonus: +3 Faith for being saved by Faith and Works

name: catholicDamned
fateDescription: In a State of Mortal Sin
leagueRules: Cannot Declare Religious War. Can Join either League. If Join, do not lose DI. Cannot win Religious Victory.
savedBonus: No bonus Faith since you are not Saved.

name: protestantSaved
leagueRules: Can Declare Religious War. Evangelical League only. If Join, -1 DI from each Catholic Prince. Religious Victory after Round 4 Religious War if Emperor, 7 Electors, and > 1/2 map Protestant.
savedBonus: +3 Faith for being saved by Faith Alone

name: protestantDamned
leagueRules: Cannot Declare Religious War. Can Join either League. If Join, do not lose DI. Cannot win Religious Victory.
savedBonus: No bonus Faith since you are not Saved.
